item.title: 日本东北海岸遭受系列地震袭击，但未发生重大停电事故
item.description: 周日，日本东北海岸发生了一系列地震，引发了海啸警报，并造成了一些轻微的电力中断。【原文：A series of quakes hit the northeast coast of Japan on Sunday, triggering a tsunami advisory and causing some minor power outage.】

item.title: 土耳其人驱车数小时在希腊购买奶酪以躲避通货膨胀
item.description: 几乎每个月，吉汗-西塔克（Cihan Citak）都会手持护照，坐进汽车，从伊斯坦布尔出发，前往距离土耳其边境 40 公里（25 英里）的希腊海滨城市亚历山德鲁波利斯（Alexandroupolis）。经过大约四个小时的车程后，他走在当地超市拥挤的过道上，用购物车装满葡萄酒、奶酪和其他杂货，而这些东西的价格只是家乡的几分之一。【原文：Almost every month, Cihan Citak gets into his car, passport in hand, and sets off from Istanbul to Alexandroupolis, a Greek seaside city 40 kilometers (25 miles) from the Turkish border. After a roughly four-hour drive, he walks the crowded aisles of the local supermarket, filling his cart with wine, cheese and other groceries that cost a fraction of what they do back home.】

item.title: 风王 "成为超强台风，即将登陆菲律宾
item.description: 风王 "在接近菲律宾陆地时加强为超强台风，促使仍在一周前致命风暴中挣扎的菲律宾取消了政府工作、学校和公共活动。【原文：Fung-Wong strengthened into a super typhoon as it approached the Philippine land mass, prompting the cancellation of government work, schools, and public events in the nation still reeling from a deadly storm a week ago.】

item.title: 威士卡、万事达卡与商户纠纷接近和解华尔街日报
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引熟悉此事的未具名人士的话报道，威士公司和万事达公司即将解决与商家长达 20 年的法律纠纷。【原文：Visa and Mastercard are close to settling a 20-year legal spat with merchants, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing unidentified people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国居民消费价格因节日需求意外上涨
item.description: 中国 10 月份居民消费价格意外上涨，原因是当月节假日刺激了旅游、食品和交通需求。【原文：China’s consumer prices unexpectedly rose in October, as holidays during the month boosted travel, food and transport demand.】

item.title: 几内亚最高法院批准军政府领导人参加总统选举
item.description: 几内亚是西非国家，也是世界上最大的铝土矿出口国，该国最高法院批准了军政府领导人马马迪-杜姆布亚（Mamadi Doumbouya）将军参加 12 月 28 日总统选举的申请。【原文：The Supreme Court of Guinea, a west African nation that’s the world’s biggest exporter of bauxite, approved military junta leader General Mamadi Doumbouya’s bid to run in the Dec. 28 presidential election.】

item.title: 亚洲人工智能股暴跌引发对全球反弹的疑虑
item.description: 上周亚洲科技股的突然暴跌令投资者大跌眼镜，这清楚地提醒人们，人工智能和半导体类股在全球范围内掀起的涨势可能已接近短期波峰。【原文：The sudden slump in Asia’s technology shares last week has jolted investors, serving as a stark reminder that the world-beating rally in artificial intelligence and semiconductor stocks may be nearing a short-term crest.】

item.title: 欧尔班称特朗普提议保护匈牙利免受投机者侵害
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普同意在匈牙利经济受到投机性攻击时为其提供支持，但他没有提供任何有关协议的具体细节。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban said that US President Donald Trump agreed to support his country’s economy if it came under a speculative attack, although he didn’t offer any specifics about a deal.】

item.title: 美联储面临的数据迷雾愈演愈烈，因为停摆推迟了美国通胀数据的公布
item.description: 两份月度就业报告成为美国政府最长停摆的牺牲品，而下周将公布的一份关键通胀快报也岌岌可危，这表明美联储的数据迷雾越来越浓，而美联储的分歧是近来最大的。【原文：Two monthly jobs reports have fallen victim to the longest US government shutdown and a key inflation snapshot due in the coming week is also in jeopardy, illustrating a thickening data fog for a Federal Reserve that’s the most divided in recent memory.】

item.title: 工会抨击特朗普在造船问题上放过中国
item.description: 以美国钢铁工人联合会为首的一批工会抨击特朗普政府暂停对中国船只征收港口费，工人们认为这将使一度占主导地位的国内造船业得以复兴。【原文：A group of labor unions led by the United Steelworkers slammed the Trump administration for suspending port fees on Chinese ships that workers argued would bring about a revival in the once-dominant domestic shipbuilding industry.】

item.title: 据说上交所正在探索包括出售股份在内的融资方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，SSE Plc 正在探索各种融资方案，包括出售股票，以筹集数十亿英镑的资金。【原文：SSE Plc is exploring funding options, including a share sale that could raise billions of pounds, as the utility seeks capital to meet a grid spending boost, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 恐惧重回垃圾债券市场
item.description: 垃圾债券投资者对风险越来越惧怕。【原文：Junk bond investors are getting more skittish about risk.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯莱鹏警告欧洲债券 "只会导致债务增加
item.description: 在荷兰继续努力组建新政府之际，荷兰央行行长兼欧洲央行管理委员会成员奥拉夫-斯莱鹏（Olaf Sleijpen）告诫不要轻易签署欧洲联合债券。【原文：As the Netherlands continues efforts to form a new government, its central bank chief and ECB Governing Council member Olaf Sleijpen cautioned against signing off too easily on joint European bonds.】

item.title: 卡普托告诉银行家阿根廷应建立储备、回购债券
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，阿根廷经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）在纽约向投资者表示，阿根廷计划回购主权债券，并开始积累外汇储备，即使比索在区间内波动。【原文：Economy Minister Luis Caputo told investors in New York that Argentina plans to buy back sovereign bonds and start accumulating foreign reserves even while the peso trades within its band, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 1,900% 的股票收益和仇恨邮件：欢迎来到量子投资
item.description: Rigetti Computing 公司和 D-Wave Quantum 公司生产的产品迄今为止在现实世界中几乎没有应用。这两家公司正在烧钱，预计数年内也不会产生大量收入。尽管如此，投资者还是对它们爱不释手。【原文：Rigetti Computing Inc. and D-Wave Quantum Inc. make products that so far have few real world applications. They’re burning through cash and aren’t expected to generate significant amounts of revenue for years. Despite all that, investors can’t get enough of them.】

item.title: 特朗普下一步会买什么？白宫选股大战一触即发
item.description: 亚当-吉登斯（Adam Giddens）过去在寻找可购买的股票时，主要依靠筛选服务和社交媒体上的热议。不过最近，他把目光转向了另一种有影响力的人：唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：Adam Giddens used to mainly rely on screening services and social-media buzz when looking for stocks to buy. Lately, though, he’s turned his attention to a different kind of influencer: Donald Trump.】

item.description: 该框架明确了在国内生产哪些产品重要，哪些不重要。【原文：The framework makes clear what’s important to manufacture at home, and what’s not.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：英格兰银行维持利率不变
item.description: 英国央行官员本周以微弱票数维持利率稳定，同时为 12 月降息敞开大门，这将取决于通胀和就业数据以及政府的秋季预算。【原文：Bank of England officials held interest rates steady this week in a narrow vote while keeping the door open to a December cut that will hinge on inflation and employment data as well as the government’s autumn budget.】

But the obsession with protein may have started earlier — with a humble dairy product that defied the broader decline in US milk consumption. Fairlife, which uses a specialized filtering process to boost protein and cut sugar and lactose in its milk products, helped spark the modern protein craze that’s unfolded alongside the rise of Ozempic and other GLP-1 drugs. item.title: 英国租房投诉攀升至历史最高点
item.description: 针对英国房东的投诉创下了历史新高，在过去十年中几乎翻了一番；而这还是在旨在加强租房者权利的全面新规生效之前。【原文：Complaints against UK landlords are at a record high, almost doubling over the past decade — and that’s before sweeping new rules to bolster renters’ rights come into force.】

item.title: 越南总理称第四季度 GDP 必须增长 8.4% 才能实现增长目标
item.description: 越南总理范明正周六表示，如果越南要实现政府提出的 2025 年经济增长超过 8%的目标，今年最后一个季度的经济增长率必须至少达到 8.4%。【原文：Vietnam’s economy must grow at least 8.4% in the final quarter of the year if the nation is to meet the government’s 2025 target of more than 8% expansion, Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh said Saturday.】

item.title: 桑托斯更接近于从价值 45 亿美元的巴罗萨气田运输液化天然气
item.description: 桑托斯有限公司（Santos Ltd.）表示，该公司耗资 45 亿美元在澳大利亚北部近海建造的巴罗萨（Barossa）油气田正在向运输第一批液化天然气货物的方向迈进。【原文：Santos Ltd. signaled progress toward shipping the first liquefied natural gas cargo from its $4.5 billion Barossa field off northern Australia, a project that counts as a cornerstone asset for the company.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官要求台积电提供更多晶圆以满足强劲的人工智能需求
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋表示，由于人工智能需求依然强劲，他已要求台湾半导体制造股份有限公司提供更多芯片供应。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said he had asked Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. for more chip supplies as artificial intelligence demand remains strong.】

item.title: 台风 "凤王 "逼近，菲律宾做好准备
item.description: 菲律宾救灾机构和地方政府部门已开始为台风 "凤王 "的到来做准备，先期从脆弱地区疏散居民，并储存设备和救灾物资。【原文：Philippine disaster agencies and local government units started preparing for the arrival of Typhoon Fung-Wong, with the pre-emptive evacuation of residents from vulnerable areas and the storing of equipment and relief supplies.】

item.title: 辉瑞在与诺和诺德的竞购战中提高了对美塞拉的报价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，辉瑞公司已向肥胖症药物初创公司 Metsera Inc. 提交了一份更加诱人的收购要约，因为该公司与竞争对手诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的争斗正在继续升级。【原文：Pfizer Inc. has submitted a sweetened bid for obesity drug startup Metsera Inc. as its fight against rival Novo Nordisk A/S continues to escalate, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法官宣布麻省理工学院毕业生兄弟诈骗案无效
item.description: 纽约的一名法官周五宣布对两兄弟欺诈案的审判无效，这两兄弟都刚从麻省理工学院毕业，他们被指控从以太坊区块链上的交易商那里窃取了大约 2500 万美元的加密货币。【原文：A judge in New York on Friday declared a mistrial in the fraud case against two brothers, both recently graduated from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, who were accused of stealing roughly $25 million in cryptocurrency from traders on the Ethereum blockchain.】

item.title: HF Sinclair 和 Phillips 66 赢得环保局生物燃料贷款豁免权
item.description: 周五，HF Sinclair Corp. 和 Phillips 66 Co. 旗下的炼油厂赢得了特朗普政府对生物燃料掺混规定的豁免，而雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）的请求则遭到拒绝。【原文：Refineries owned by HF Sinclair Corp. and Phillips 66 Co. won exemptions from biofuel blending mandates from the Trump administration Friday, while requests by Chevron Corp. were denied.】

item.title: 菲律宾经济增长震荡引发投资者末日论战
item.description: 菲律宾经济增长急剧下滑，暴露了大规模贪污腐败的曝光如何打击了人们的信心，尽管高官们坚称国家仍在正常运转。【原文：The Philippines’ sharp growth slump lays bare how revelations of massive graft have gutted confidence, even as top officials insist the nation is still on track.】
